title: Individual Study in Terrorism Studies; Experiential Learning in Terrorism; Anti-Defamation League Collegiate Challenge
description:
Restriction: permission of department.

Using a provided operational budget and Facebook ad credits, the social media campaign design, implementation, and measurement of success will be up to the team members. The winning project will be selected based onits propensity to motivate students to become involved in fighting bigotry, hate and exclusion, promote dialogue within communities to encourage justice, equality and inclusion, and empower other students tocreate their own initiatives.
